Ngamanye amaxesha, abantwana bethu abafikisayo bayalibala ukuba abazali babo nabo ngabantu!
* Think of three statements about yourse:

* Kunganceda ukucinga ngezinto ozinqwenelayo, amaphupha akho, amava asesikolweni, izinto ozithandayo okanye ongazithandiyo. Ngokomzekelo: Ndiyazicaphukela iibhanana, isifundo endisithandayo yisayensi kwaye ndikunqwenela kakhulu ukukwazi ukucula. 
* Zixelele umntwana wakho ofikisayo uze umbuze ukuba yeyiphi engoyonyani kwezi. 
* Ngaba uchanile xa ebeqashisela? Ngaba imothusile?
* Ngoku mcele enze into efanayo. Ikhona into entsha eniyifundileyo komnye nomnye?

@global.parent_app was developed by Pare:
@global.parent_app yaphuhliswa yiParenting for Lifelong Health (PLH) - intsebenziswano yehlabathi lonke phakathi kweengcali zobuzali ezivela kwi-UNICEF, i-WHO kunye neeYunivesithi zaseMzantsi Afrika nase-UK, kunye nee-NGO zase-Afrika kunye neentsapho kunye nolutsha kwi-Afrika iphela. Abazali kunye nabantwana abafikisayo basebenze nathi kwi-app kwaye bancedise ekuqinisekiseni ukuba kulula ukuyisebenzisa, imnandi kwaye iyabandakanya. Enye ikhontenti kule app, njenga macebiso kwizinto ezinokwenziwa kunye namabali anemifanekiso, yenziwe nabazali kunye nabantwana abafikisayo ukuqinisekisa ukuba iyahambelana nemfuno zentsapho

i-Parenting for Lifelong Health (PLH) izibophelele ekuxhaseni izixhobo nenkqubo ezisimahla nokwabelwana ngazo zobuzali, ukuxhasa abazali kwihlabathi jikelele ukukhuthaza impilo-ntle yabantwana babo.

Ngokucofa eli qhosha lingezantsi uza kubuyisela i-app kwiisetingi zayo zakuqala. 

Oku kuthetha ukuba yonke inkqubela osowuyenzile nedatha yokusetyenziswa iya kucinywa kwaye i-app yakho iya kusebenza ngokungathi isanda ku-instolwa okokuqala.

PHAWULA: Ukuyiseta kwakhona i-app kusisigxina kwaye awuyi kukwazi ukubuyisela nayiphi na inkcazelo.

Ngokucofa eli qhosha lingezantsi uya kuvula lonke iindibano zocweyo.

QAPHELA: Abasebenzisi akufuneki basebenzise lo msebenzi ukuvula iindibano zocweyo, oku akucetyiswa ngaphandle kokuba kunyanzelekile.
Lonke iindabano zocweyo uvela luvuliwe ngoku.
Losing a loved one can feel very overwhe: Ukufelwa ngumntu omthandayo kunokuvakala kukoyisa kakhulu. Nanga amacebiso ambalwa asebenzayo anokuba luncedo ukuwakhumbula.
- Ask someone you trust for help - food:
- Cela umntu omthembileyo ukuba akuncede - ukutya okanye ukhathalelo lwabantwana kunokuba luncedo. Unokufuna amaxwebhu elifa, abantwana bakho, okanye ukufikelela kwiinkonzo.
- Ngamanye amaxesha abantu bazama ukuthatha imali okanye ilifa kumntu osentlungwini. Fumana malunga namalungelo wakho.
- Saying goodbye is difficult. Do what f:
Ukuvalelisa kunzima. Yenza oko kubonakala kulungile kuwe nakumntwana wakho.
- Iintsapho, abantwana kunye nabazali abafezekanga. Xa umntu efile, kulungile ukuthetha ngezinto ezilungileyo nezimbi esizikhumbulayo.
- Kunganceda ukubhala ileta okanye ukwenza umzobo womntu omkileyo.
- Abanye abantu benza umsitho okanye benze isidlo esikhethekileyo sokubhiyozela umntu, kwaye bathi ndlela ntle.
- Inokukunceda ukwenza ibhokisi yeenkumbulo, ukubeka izinto ezikukhumbuza wena kunye nomntwana wakho ngalomntu.
- Inokukunceda ukuthetha malunga ngalomntu xana ucinga ngaye.
Losing a friend or loved one is hard for: Ukulahlekelwa ngumhlobo okanye othandekayo kunzima kumntu wonke. Ukuba nobubele kuwe kunye nokwenza izinto zokuzinceda uhlangabezane neli xesha linzima kunceda nomntwana wakho ofikisayo!
- Grief can affect us for weeks or month:
- Intlungu inokusichaphazela kangangeeveki okanye iinyanga okanye iminyaka. Akuyomfuneko ukuba uzive ubhetele ngokukhawuleza.
- Lala ngokwaneleyo kunye nokutya - kunzima ukukhathalela abantwana xana udiniwe kwaye ulambile.
- Yenza uluhlu lwezinto ezikwenza uzive ngcono, kwaye uzenze.
- Zama ukwenza into enye elula yokuphumla yonke imihla nomntwana wakho ofikisayo, kunye nawe ngokwakho.
- Kulungile ukuziva ulungile kwaye kulungile ukukhala. Ungaze uzibeke ityala, ayilotyala lakho eli.
- Kuhlala kukho ithemba nasemva kokulahlekelwa. Zama ukonwabela izinto ezilula, kwaye uthathe umzuzu ukwenza into emnandi okanye ukuphumla nomntwana wakho.
- Fumana umntu omdala omnye okanye ababini abanokukuxhasa, bakumamele, kwaye bathethe.
- Talking with someone who can support y: - Ukuthetha nomntu onokukuxhasa kwaye akumamele kunokunceda. Kunokunceda kananjalo ukuzimanya neqela labantu abalahlekelwe ngabantu nabo. Khumbula ukuba akukho mntu ugqibeleleyo. Kulungile ukuthetha ngamaxesha amnandi namabi.
Teenagers deal with loss in different wa: Abantwana abafikisayo bajongana nelahleko ngeendlela ezahlukeneyo, njengabantu abadala. Ungabanceda baqonde imeko kunye neemvakalelo zabo ngokudala iindawo ezikhuselekileyo apho unokwabelana nobabini kwaye niqhubeke.
- Tell your teen that the person has die:
Xelela umntwana wakho ukuba lomntu uswelekile - ngamanye amaxesha akaziqondi.
- Ukuxelela yinkqubo, hayi isiganeko. Kusenokufuneka ubaxelele ngokuphindaphindiweyo.
- Sebenzisa amagama abawaqondayo.
- Ukuba abantwana basebancinci akayiqondi ukuba yintoni ukufa, nceda uchaze ukuba umntu omthandayo akabuyi. Zama ukuba ungabizi 'ukulala' okanye 'uhambo lokuhamba'.
- abantwana abadala  bangakuqonda ukuba yintoni ukufa, kodwa banokuba nzima ukwabelana okanye ukuphatha iimvakalelo zabo.
- Abantwana banonokuphendula ngeendlela ezahlukeneyo: ukukhala, ukukhwaza, ukungakholelwa okanye ukuzola kakhulu. Zonke ezi zinto zilungile. Baxelele ukuba ukunye nabo.
-Vumela imibuzo kunye nokuthetha. Nyaniseka. Kulungile ukutsho xana singazi.
- Teens might be sad, angry, not underst:
- Abantwana banokuba lusizi, nomsindo, bangayiqondi okanye bangakholelwa, baziva ndindisholo, bangaziva kamnandi okanye babe neentlungu, amaphupha amabi okanye iingxaki esikolweni. Umntwana wakho ofikisayo usenokubonakala onwabile, kodwa abe buhlungu. Basenokuzivale baze bafune ukuchitha ixesha elingakumbi nabahlobo. Basenokubonisa indlela yokuziphatha engalindelekanga okanye eyingozi. Ezi zisenokungabi nangqiqo kuwe, kodwa konke oku kuqhelekile.
- Abantwana banokuziva ngathi lityala labo - ukuba baye bosulela intsholongwane, okanye baziphathe kakubi. Baxelele ngokucacileyo ukuba akukho nto iphosakeleyo bayenzileyo.
- Explain that grief comes with many emo:
- Cacisa ukuba intlungu iza neemvakalelo ezininzi kunye neempendulo. Bonisa umntwana wakho ukuba uyathandwa kwaye uyakhathalelwa, kwaye umkhuthaze ukuba abelane ngeemvakalelo zakhe ngokuthetha, ukubhala okanye ukuzoba.
- Ukuba kukho iqela lenkxaso umntwana wakho anokuba yinxalenye yalo, oku kunganceda.
- Ukuba umntwana ofikisayo uthetha ngokufuna ukuzenzakalisa okanye ukuzibulala, cela uncedo komnye umntu ngokukhawuleza kangangoko unako.
- Ukuba unako, gcina inkquboi yakho yesiqhelo yemihla ngemihla, oku kunokuba yintuthuzelo kwabaselula.
- Kunganceda ukuba abantwana bakho babe yinxalenye yezithethe malunga nokufa - ukukhetha ingoma okanye into yokuthetha.
- Ukuchitha imizuzu embalwa yonke imihla ugxile kumntwana wakho ofikisayo kunceda ukumenza azive ekhuselekile kwaye umnike ithuba lokuphumla okanye ukuthetha ngezinto ezimkhathazayo.
